# Schwab Advisor Services™

**Status:** SaaS Verification Complete  
**Date Created:** 2026-02-12  
**Researcher:** OpenClaw AI Agent

---

## Overview

- **Company:** Schwab Advisor Services (Charles Schwab & Co., Inc.)
- **Website:** https://advisorservices.schwab.com/
- **Category:** RIA Custodian & Financial Advisor Platform
- **Support Contact:** 800-647-5465

---

## Brief Description

Schwab Advisor Services is a fee-based custodian platform designed for Registered Investment Advisors (RIAs). With over 35 years of custodian experience, Schwab supports 16,000+ advisory firms through a dedicated team of 3,000+ professionals. The platform includes Schwab Advisor ProDirect™, a membership program focused on organic growth, operational optimization, and enterprise value enhancement.

Key features include:
- Custodial services for RIAs
- Advisor Platform Support
- Dedicated client service teams
- Technology and operational solutions
- Practice management resources

---

## Pricing Structure

**Model:** Transaction-Based & Custody Fee Model (Not SaaS Subscription)

Schwab Advisor Services operates as a custodian, not a traditional software subscription service. Advisors pay for transactions, custody, and services rather than monthly/annual platform fees. Pricing consists of:

### Transaction Pricing Categories

| Transaction Type | Electronic | Broker-Assisted |
|---|---|---|
| **U.S. Exchange-Listed Securities** | $0 | $25 |
| **OTC Securities** | $6.95 | $31.95 |
| **Canadian Stock** | $6.95 | $31.95 |
| **Foreign Stock (OTC or Direct)** | $50 | $75 |
| **Options (per contract)** | $0.65 | $0.65 + $25 |
| **Mutual Funds (NTF)** | $0 | $0 |
| **Mutual Funds (Transaction Fee)** | $45 | $65 |
| **Treasuries (Secondary)** | $0 | $25 |
| **Government Agencies (per bond)** | $0.20 ($10-$250) | $0.24 ($10-$275) |
| **Corporate/Municipal Bonds (per bond)** | $1 ($10-$250) | $1.20 ($10-$275) |

### Service & Account Fees

| Service | Fee |
|---|---|
| **Wire Transfer (Outgoing)** | $25 ($0 via electronic channel) |
| **Full Transfer Out** | $50 per account |
| **Certificate Order Out** | $100 per certificate |
| **Foreign Currency Conversion** | Up to 3% markup |
| **Block Desk Advanced Order Handling** | $5 per account (effective March 2026) |
| **Prime Brokerage/Trade-Away** | $25 per trade allocation |
| **Fixed Income Directed Trades** | $50 per trade |
| **Non-Publicly Traded Securities Custody** | $250/position ($500 max/account annually) |
| **Nonsufficient Funds/Returned Item** | $25 per item |

### Pricing Types

**Basic Pricing:** Standard rates listed above (default)

**Alternative Pricing:** Negotiated rates based on:
- Advisor AUM custodied at Schwab
- Trading frequency and volume
- Expected asset growth
- Research and services provided to advisor
- Can be lower OR higher than Basic Pricing

**Advisor Billing:** Available for wrap fee programs where advisor pays Schwab directly for transaction fees in lieu of client account charges.

### Notes on Pricing

- **No Platform Subscription Fee:** Unlike traditional SaaS, there's no monthly/annual software license fee
- **Minimum Balance:** Not explicitly stated; varies by advisor agreement
- **Free Trial:** N/A (custodian relationship, not SaaS trial)
- **User Limits:** Not applicable (custodian model)
- **Industry Fees:** Additional SEC/FINRA/SRO fees passed through (e.g., Section 31 Fee, FINRA Trading Activity Fee, Options Regulatory Fee)
- **ADR Pass-Through Fees:** Banks charge ADR holders fees that are automatically deducted
- **Pricing Updated:** January 2026 (per Schwab Pricing Guide)

---

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities

- **Custody & Clearing:** Full-service custodian for RIA client assets
- **Schwab Advisor Center®:** Web-based platform for account management, trading, and reporting
- **Schwab Alliance Portal:** Dedicated advisor access portal (schwaballiance.com)
- **Trading Execution:** Multi-channel execution (electronic, broker-assisted, block desk)
- **Account Opening:** Streamlined digital account opening workflow
- **Client Reporting:** Comprehensive account statements and trade confirmations
- **Cashiering Services:** Wire transfers, check orders, fund movements
- **Schwab MoneyLink®:** Automated bank transfers
- **Mobile Access:** Schwab Mobile app access for advisors
- **Security Custody:** Physical and electronic security custody

### Advanced Features

- **iRebal® Platform:** Portfolio rebalancing tool integrated into Schwab Advisor Center
- **Model Market Center™ (MMC):** Web-based model marketplace for advisors using iRebal
- **Schwab Performance Technologies® (SPT):** Technology solutions for advisors
- **Schwab Advisor Portfolio Connect™:** Portfolio aggregation and reporting
- **Institutional Intelligent Portfolios (IIP):** Automated investment platform for advisors
- **API Integration:** Real-time custody data access via APIs for custom integrations
- **Third-Party Integration Network:** Deep integrations with leading advisor tech platforms
- **Block Trading Support:** Advanced order handling for complex trades (TWAP, VWAP, POV algorithms)
- **Fixed Income Platform:** Access to bonds, CDs, Treasuries, and structured products
- **Mutual Fund OneSource®:** No-transaction-fee mutual fund platform
- **Options Trading:** Full options trading suite with $0.65 per-contract pricing
- **Margin Lending:** Margin accounts with competitive interest rates

### Enterprise/Premium Features

- **Schwab Advisor ProDirect™:** Membership program for organic growth, operational optimization, and enterprise value
- **Ultra-High-Net-Worth (UHNW) Services:** Specialized support and pricing for UHNW clients
- **Dedicated Service Teams:** 3,000+ professionals supporting 16,000+ firms
- **Practice Management Consulting:** Business growth and operational guidance
- **Transition Support:** Assistance for advisors transitioning to independence
- **Technology Consulting:** Custom integration support and API development guidance
- **Market Data Services:** Real-time market data feeds and pricing
- **Schwab Wealth Advisory Integration:** Access to Schwab's own wealth advisory services for referrals

### Limitations

- **Advisor-Only:** Not available to individual retail investors (must work through an RIA)
- **Custody Relationship Required:** Full business relationship needed, not a standalone software tool
- **Alternative Pricing Negotiation:** Better pricing requires asset commitments and may not be available to small advisors
- **Transaction Fees:** While competitive, still charges per-trade fees (unlike some zero-commission brokers)
- **Non-Publicly Traded Securities:** High annual custody fees ($250/position) for illiquid holdings
- **Foreign Exchange Markup:** Up to 3% on currency conversions
- **Broker-Assisted Premiums:** $25 extra for non-electronic trades
- **Limited Control Over Industry Fees:** Pass-through fees from SEC/FINRA/exchanges can fluctuate
- **No Direct Consumer Access:** Clients must access through their advisor relationship

---

## Add-On Products & Services

### Schwab Performance Technologies® (SPT)
- **What it does:** Technology platform for advisors (separate from custody services)
- **Key Features:**
  - iRebal® (rebalancing)
  - Model Market Center™ (model marketplace)
  - Institutional Intelligent Portfolios (automated investing)
  - Schwab Advisor Portfolio Connect™ (aggregation)
- **Pricing:** Separate from custody fees; negotiated per advisor
- **Use Cases:** Advisors wanting portfolio automation, rebalancing, and model management

### Schwab Advisor ProDirect™
- **What it does:** Membership program for growth and operational optimization
- **Key Features:**
  - Organic growth resources
  - Operational efficiency consulting
  - Enterprise value enhancement
  - Practice management tools
- **Pricing:** Contact for pricing
- **Use Cases:** Advisors looking to scale their practice and improve operations

### Schwab Wealth Advisory
- **What it does:** Affiliated wealth management service for client referrals
- **Key Features:**
  - Professional portfolio management
  - Financial planning
  - 0.80% starting fee (decreases with higher AUM)
  - $500,000 minimum
- **Pricing:** 0.80% of AUM (sliding scale)
- **Use Cases:** Advisors referring clients needing comprehensive wealth management

### Market Data Services
- **What it does:** Real-time market data feeds
- **Key Features:**
  - Level I & II quotes
  - Streaming data
  - Historical data
- **Pricing:** Per Market Data Pricing Guide (separate fees)
- **Use Cases:** Advisors needing real-time market data in their systems
